* Package.json :- This file lists all of the dependencies that our project needs in order to run . It lists the name of the packages that our project needs as well as their versions.This file is used by npm package manager to install the correct versions of all the dependencies which we npm install.

*package-lock.json :- The file is generated by npm and lists the exact versions of all the dependencies that were installed including all of
 their dependencies.This file is used to ensure that the same versions of all dependencies are installed every time we run npm install . even 
 if we move the project to different computer or versions.
